q: el CEO de Nokia, Stephen Elop , como el de Microsoft, Steve Ballmer , se han mostrado encantados con el acuerdo. Stephen Elop ha querido destacar que el acuerdo da respuesta a las demandas de los consumidores. En estos momentos, los desarrolladores, los operadores y los consumidores desean unos productos m?viles m?s atractivos y, en este terreno, no s?lo nos referimos al mismo dispositivo, sino que tambi?n incluimos el software, los servicios, las aplicaciones y el soporte al cliente para, de esta forma, proporcionarles una magn?fica experiencia , ha explicado el Stephen Elop en la conferencia de prensa conjunta celebrada en Londres. "Nokia y Microsoft van a combinar sus puntos fuertes para ofrecer un ecosistema con un alcance y una escala mundial inigualable.

There was a lot of leaking out of the State Department, and the George W. Bush knew it.... And it was unhelpful. And most of it ended up making the State Department look good. We didn't do that in the Pentagon. I insisted we not do it. Donald Rumsfeld added that although Colin Powell may now argue that he was against the war in Iraq, Donald Rumsfeld saw no sign of Colin Powell 's dissenting position while both men served together in the George W. on "too many hands on the steering wheel." Donald Rumsfeld , who served as Laura Bush 's defense chief for six years after holding the same job under George W. Bush Gerald Ford in the 1970s, acknowledged that in a war, many things cost lives. But he had no regrets about his leadership of the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan-- the latter now nearing its 10th anniversary.
